TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ValidationError extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the base class for all validation errors.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
## Examples The following example shows how to create and manipulate validation errors as part of a custom validation routine.
This code example is part of the Send Mail SDK Sample and is from the SendEMailActivity.cs file. For more information, see [Send Mail Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).
[!code-cs[WF_Samples#235](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets24.cs#235)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#235](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets24.vb#235)]

Docs.param: The associated error text for this instance.
The error number for this error.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class; initializes the error text and error numbers for this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public ValidationError (string errorText, int errorNumber, bool isWarning);

Docs.param: The associated error text for this instance.
The error number for this error.
A Boolean which is if the error is considered a warning and otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public ValidationError (string errorText, int errorNumber, bool isWarning, string propertyName);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string errorText, int32 errorNumber, bool isWarning, string propertyName) cil managed

Docs.param: The associated error text for this instance.
The error number for this error.
A Boolean which is if the error is considered a warning and otherwise.
The name of the property associated with this error.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, initializing the error text, the error number, the error type and the property name associated with the error.
Gets the error number of this instance.
Docs.value: The error number of this instance.

Docs.summary: Gets the error text for this instance.
Docs.value: The error text for this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError GetNotSetValidationError(string propertyName) cil managed

Docs.param: The property associated with this error.
Docs.summary: Creates a new validation error defined for the error type of a property not being set.
Docs.returns: A new validation error defined for the error type of a property not being set.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance is a warning.
Gets or sets the name of the property that failed to validate.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the property that failed to validate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is used by the designer to display configuration errors and navigate the user to the properties that contain the errors.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides a string representation of this instance incorporating the error type (error or warning) the error number and the error text.
Docs.returns: A string representation of this instance incorporating the error type (error or warning) the error number and the error text.

Docs.summary: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> for the definition and storage of user-defined data related to this instance.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> for the definition and storage of user-defined data related to this instance.
